reviews.text:
We love Norma NYC! It‚Äôs Sicilian - not your typical American Italian spot - so don‚Äôt come expecting fettuccine Alfredo or endless breadsticks. The pasta is incredible and every dish feels authentically made with care and tradition.

Definitely ask your waiter for recommendations and trust what they suggest - they know what‚Äôs best that day and every time we‚Äôve taken their advice, it‚Äôs been spot on.
The food and atmosphere here are always amazing! The staff are super friendly and provide a cozy and intimate energy!
Great food. Service was spot on. Crazy busy with that New York vibe.
The food and service were excellent. You can really taste how fresh the ingredients are. We had to wait a bit to be seated, but it was absolutely worth it.

Super delish meals and awesome gluten free pizza. Lots of flavor with everything we had . Loved the regular bread . Gluten free pizza was super good . Great service - didn‚Äôt wait long for our meals to arrive. Loved this place

Our go to place in HK. It‚Äôs in our neighborhood and we love it. The food is delicious and consistent. The atmosphere is fun with great music. The staff is the BEST!!! Every single one. Martina has served us a few times over the past couple weeks. She is absolutely wonderful!! Love all of you!

Oh my! The best part of this place is the staff; they all seem to be from somewhere in Italy. Super friendly, helped my mother find the restroom and back outside to the table. Serving size of my pasta was on the small side, but the waitstaff made up for any inadequacies to serving size.
Delicious lunch in such a cute space. I had the lasagna which was amazing and the perfect portion for lunch.

I love Norma Hell's kitchen, I normally go for lunch, I like all the food (arancini, timballo, paste are my favorites)and the pizzas ( especially the mortadella one) and I love to finish with a cassation.
The service is by really exquisite young people that know their food and try to be as fast as possible, Price point is very good for such quality!!!! and for NY.
Yesterday I went for late dinner, wait was less than expected, the young lady that took care of us was caring, fast and knowledgeable.
At night inside is a little bit noisy, so not ideal if you want a quiet night, but the atmosphere is fun.

Ieri sera ho cenato da Norma Hell's kitchen e ho gustato una pasta alla Norma che forse mai nella vita. Strepitosa. Locale affollato (buon segno) e rumoroso nella media (il chiasso abita il 90% dei ristoranti a NY) ma con attesa ragionevole, servito e seguito con professionalit√† e grande simpatia da Martina. Torner√≤ presto

My parents and I had the most wonderful time tonight. We come to Norma every time they are in town. Tonight we had a new waitress, Martina‚Ä¶. ABSOLUTELY wonderful. We had many questions about wines and food and this lady had the answers to everything. She was warm, personable, and gave us a wonderful dining experience. As always, the food was incredible and the wine recommendation was perfect. Never had a bad experience at Norma.
The pesto was very different and amazing. Service is delightful.
Pizza und Pasta waren wirklich sehr lecker, der Service sehr nett. K√∂nnen das Restaurant sehr empfehlen.

Absolutely amazing food, service and atmosphere, which definitely looks like a little Italian restaurant from the inside!

The pizzas are absolutely delicious and the pastas as well. I would strongly recommend the Busiate al pesto and the gnocchi!

Definitely will be coming back next time i come to nyc.
Tekrar tekrar geleceƒüim‚Ä¶
Amazing all around. The food was perfect and absolutely delicious.  The staff are incredibly amazing and make you feel at home. Love love this place and will be coming here again.

We absolutely loved our lunch at Norma. Pasta's were all great and I appreciated that the spaghetti was freshly made in house. Usually spaghetti is made from dried noodle but there's was fresh. I also appreciated the wine recommendation as it was from a region of Italy I'd never had wine from and we really enjoyed it. Great stop.
The store felt safe and secure.
Pizza incr√≠vel! Massa surreal de gostosa e recheio melhor ainda

Martina's service was great. Food was amazing as always. Highly recommend.

We had a excellent meal for two tonight. Our server Martina was very friendly with good suggestions on the wine, we also took her advice and had the Mortadella pizza, Lamb pasta and finished with a tiramisu. All were super delicious, our favourite was the pasta.
Great service by Martina. Professional and makes you feel home .
Ambiente favoloso, l‚ÄôItalia a New York. Abbiamo mangiato divinamente, la pizza buonissima e la pasta eccezionale, il personale molto simpatico ed accogliente. Come se fossimo di casa.
Great place, great atmosphere and great food!! Martina was our server and she was a total delight and made our meal even better

The food and staff are excellent here. Came here last minute with my daughter who is in a wheelchair and they got us seated right away. The pizza looked and tasted amazing. In fact, I watched other as their pizza came and every single person of took pictures of their food because of how good it looked. We also had the arancini and it was the best I‚Äôve ever had.
Deli section had lots of options.
Super bonne pizza, un restaurant Italien tr√®s chaleureux. Je vous le recommande.
It was my first visit. I loved everything I was served. From the arancine, octopus carpaccio, to the pizza. All accompanied by great service.
Very rude staff. mediocre food relative to nyc.
This place accomodated our last minute request for a table for 15 and treated us so well while we were there. The food was also excellent. Thank you, Norma!
Awesome place
Super, pizza excellente et service rapide. Tout ce qu‚Äôon aime
Popped in for lunch and this is the Real Deal(tm). Happy we were close by and there was room for us. Highly recommend,  you won't be disappointed
Authentic and creative Italian dishes. Excellent sauces,  fresh and full of flavor.
had the lasagna it was delicious. my son had gluten free pizza he said it was the best gluten free pie crust he's had

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Norma in Hell‚Äôs Kitchen is amazing! Delicious Italian food, cozy atmosphere, and friendly service. A great spot for a relaxed dinner in the city.

Great Pizza, interesting yet amazing salad.
Nice Service, quick Food.
Everything perfect!
Fresh Burrata and the pizza was amazing.  The gluten free dough is fresh and made in-house.  It‚Äôs crisp and not soggy like what you might find in other pizzerias.

To be honest, nice flavors.
But, there is no chicken here(protein wise), there are no modifications to their pasta dishes.

I felt as thought the meal was OK, I did not love this place and walked out hungry unfortunately lacking any lean protein.

I will need to try the pizza if I go again.

Bona sera .Siamo stati nel questo locale e abiamo mangiato la pizza come nel vechii tempi di lovoro √Æn Italia .Siamo di origine Rumena ma abiamo trovato un sqoadra dei ragazzi molto √Æn gamba e un grande padrone. Tantti salute e buon lavoro.üôèüëçüé∏ü•Åüé∑.
Very good food. Pizza from Italy 100%
Everything was perfect!!! Highly recommend!!
We had the neapolitan pizza, best in new York and 1 of the best we've had!  Fantastic restaurant
Amazing traditional Italien Restaurant
Consigliatissimo. Personale gentile e proprietario molto accogliente. √à come sentirsi a casa. Cibo ottimo.
Wow‚Ä¶true NYC Italian place. Great sauce.
Very authentic.  Nice local spot for tasty pizza.
Have been there twice. Pizza is great and pasta as well.

Sat outside on a beautiful summer NYC day to enjoy a classic Sicilian-Italian lunch. We ordered the Buffalo Ricotta with orange honey, meat stuffed rice ball, and Norma pizza with tomato, mozzarella, basil, eggplant, and ricotta. The Buffalo ricotta tasted sweet and could have been served as a dessert. The pizza dough had a flaky crust and the eggplant melted in your mouth which I really enjoyed. The rice ball was stuffed with meat and tasted savory but not too salty. Great restaurant to try before seeing a Broadway show.

Quite a nice restaurant with a more traditional Italian style. The food felt authentic. I was not a big fan of the food myself but I see the effort they go to to make it high quality. If you want a more authentic experience this might be a great place for you

Best Italian food I have had in a long time! When the waiter thought we had waited too long (we were fine!) he brought out a complimentary app that was DELICIOUS! Friendly staff and great environment. A little loud, but a fun spot for a date or a group.

Great little spot for Italian. Has good atmosphere and the waiter was attentive. Came with some great bread service. I had the Rucola e Parmigiano (arugula salad with pear and walnuts). Very fresh the balsamic was just lightly drizzled but the pairing of the candied walnuts and the pear was fantastic portion was large enough to share. Had the Margherita Pizza, the cheese was good the dough was very light and full of flavor.

My parents and I ate here after seeing Othello, and the food was absolutely chef‚Äôs kiss ü§åüèΩ‚ú® We dined on the caprese, bruschetta, lasagna, and Norma aranchine and everything was to die for. So disappointed that we had to eat on the fly but it was well worth it. We sat outside and it was truly just so lovely. Service was fantastic and super kind. Def will be back when I‚Äôm in the city. I live in ATL and miss this kind of Italian üôèüèΩü´∂üèΩ

We had pizza for lunch today and right away it was the best pizza in the New York City.

Whether you're from Brooklyn, Bronx, Queens or Manhattan, you're not gonna find a better place for Margherita pizza.

The base was the perfect right amount of softness and crunch at the crust.

For those who love wine, theres ample options.

Seats are clean and tables were well maintained.

What deserves a special mention?
Their Margherita gotta be the best one int he city.

What could be better?
The seating arrangement. The tables are just too close. Imagine having apizza and someone just sneezed on it. If you care for your customers, you might wanna position the tables properly.

Amazing authentic Italian food.  Had a great experience here, between the service,  atmosphere, and the food, it was nearly perfect.  Hope to be back because there were so many additional options that I wanted to try and did not have the chance too on this visit.

Second visit to Norma now and both times it has been amazing.

The food is absolutely second to none, the service is great and the atmosphere is lovely considering you are only a few blocks from Broadway.

Tips: The Lasagne is out of this world, as is the home made gnocchi with wild boar/sausage ragu.

Makarony takie sobie, jad≈Çem w ≈ºyciu lepsze. Poleciƒá mogƒô pizzƒô zw≈Çaszcza za ciasto. Obs≈Çuga mi≈Ça i rozmowna. Niestety klimat tego miejsca by≈Ç w naszym przypadku dramatyczny. Usadowiono nas przy stoliku na zewnƒÖtrz - smr√≥d skutecznie odbiera≈Ç ochotƒô do jedzenia podobnie jak wszechobecny br√≥d. Mo≈ºe w ≈õrodku by≈Çoby lepiej, trudno powiedzieƒá. Ja nie polecam.

It‚Äôs a standing queue that is worth waiting. I‚Äòve been here 3 times. All 3 times have to wait in line. The restaurant is full of many people. The taste of delicious food, the service is right. Like it and excellent service. If you have to date or want to sit down and eat comfortably. Next message is that this is the 4th time that I came back to eat here, but I was very disappointed and sad. Because the food I ordered was not cooked from the first word that the plate was placed on the table and I ate and I informed the event that I helped me fix it. For the second time, the food came back, he just brought my food to reheat it to make it hot. And we didn‚Äòt eat it and informed that we couldn‚Äôt really eat this dish because it was not cooked. When it was time to check the bill, there was that dish in it. Which I told you to take this dish out. But the waiter who took care of me that day was very bad manners. Never met a service staff anywhere to scold customers because your food was not cooked and customers couldn‚Äòt eat. During the problem, I‚Äôm sorry about the word about the food. But the conversation ended with the word I‚Äòll

Had the Norma Pie and it was better than the piesvwevrecently had in Sicily and Rome. Norma's pasta explodes with flavor and is made fresh. I haven't experienced Italian cuisine this good anywhere. The waiters are amazing too.

Everything was great at Norma! Our food and drinks were tasty! There were so many other food options, I can‚Äôt wait to go back! We went for an early dinner at 5 and when we walked out, we saw the line people were mentioning!

Absolute gem of a spot in Hell's Kitchen. I'd had their other location saved in my NYC Food folder, but when I saw this spot was the same menu and in an area I was already planning on being, so we checked it out. Got there right as they opened and were the first ones in. The place was buzzing by the time we left. Kept it simple and got the arincini ragu and the mortadella pizza to share. The tomato sauce with the arincini was perfect. So simple. The mortadella pizza was one of my top 10 (maybe close to #5) pizzas of all time. Every ingredient was fresh. The dough was appropriately chewy, yet also light. It was a perfect pie. Go here. Seriously.

Norma in the heart of Hell‚Äôs Kitchen is a rare find with authentic Sicilian cooking in New York done right at a price that doesn‚Äôt leave you walking out with an empty wallet and an unsatisfied stomach.
The arancina is a gem, perfectly crisp on the outside and soft and rich on the inside just like they make it in Sicily. The pizza hits that perfect balance of a fragrant crust, fresh toppings, and bold flavors. This is not a place pretending to be Italian, they really are. Service is flawless, attentive without being intrusive, and the warm atmosphere makes the experience even better. In a city where Italian food is often just a label, Norma is the real thing and it is hard to find anything better in New York right now. Meglio di cos√¨ non si pu√≤. Daje!

As a family, we visited Norma Hell's Kitchen and thought that it was quite good. The pizza was very nice, and so was the Lasgane, and the rest of the pasta was ok. The service was ok, although we were not given any bread to start with. Norma is quite a busy little restraunt.

Coming back to this restaurant is always a sure thing. Every dish delivers: authentic flavors, high-quality food, impeccable service, and a relaxed yet well-curated atmosphere. It‚Äôs one of those places that never disappoints. If you‚Äôre looking for a no-surprises (in the best way!) dining experience in New York City, this spot is a safe bet.

Tornare in questo ristorante √® sempre una certezza. Ogni piatto √® una conferma: sapori autentici, cibo di qualit√†, servizio impeccabile ed atmosfera rilassata ma curata. √à uno di quei posti che non deludono mai. Se cerchi un‚Äôesperienza gastronomica senza sorprese (in senso buono!) a New York City, qui vai sul sicuro.

Die Pizza war sehr gut und hat prima geschmeckt. Trotz Wochenende bekamen wir direkt einen Tisch. Einziger Kritikpunkt ist das Ambiente: Es ist recht eng, und man wird teilweise von der Bedienung oder anderen G√§sten angerempelt. Das tr√ºbt ein wenig die Stimmung, aber Essen und Service waren gut.

Hands down, the best gluten free crust I have ever had. It was chewy! Like what I remember real bread tastes like! I came in at 1:30pm on a Friday. Seated immediately. Excellent service, lovely glass of a full bodied dry red - all Sicilian wine- and a delightful margherita pizza. Try the chili oil, it‚Äôs a game changer.

Ristorante di ottima qualit√†.
I camerieri sono molto gentili e parlano anche italiano.
I prodotti sono freschi.

Olio e pane all'inizio del pasto.

Ristorante da consigliare senza esitazione!

//

Very high-quality restaurant.
The waiters are very friendly and also speak Italian.
The ingredients are fresh.

Olive oil and bread served at the beginning of the meal.

A restaurant to recommend without hesitation!

Our pizza was phenomenal‚Äîrich, authentic, and deeply flavorful. The Norma pasta, however, was a bit too salty for our taste, which we were told was due to the sheep cheese. I‚Äôd recommend trying something else instead. Aside from that, everything else was an absolute delight.

Friendly and authentic Sicilian food

My favorite is Pasta con le Sarde a Timballo, a unique pasta dish with a crunchy crust from the oven, sardines, pine nuts, and fennel.

The Fritto Misto is ideal to share as a starter.

LEVEL PRO
Sono stata con alcuni amici da Norma a Hell‚Äôs Kitchen per la cena dell‚Äôultimo dell‚Äôanno. Da precisare che ho origini siciliane quindi sono molto critica sulla cucina siciliana. Abbiamo assaggiato vari antipasti tutti squisiti: caponata, polpette, arancini e panelle. Come primi gli anelletti al forno cotti nella teglia di terracotta (spaziali) e le busiate al pesto (molto buone).
Per dolce abbiamo gustato con piacere il tiramis√π, dolce molto equilibrato e i cannoli, la cialda veramente friabile e la ricotta delicata, gustosa ma non troppo dolce. Tutti i piatti sono fedeli alle ricette della tradizione e non hanno subito l‚Äôinfluenza americana. Aperitivi e vini di alta qualit√†. Perci√≤ se desiderate mangiare cibo italiano (siciliano) questo ristorante √® il posto perfetto!!
Fra l‚Äôaltro ci sono altre sue sedi, una a Murray Hill e l‚Äôaltra a Turtle Bay.

The pizza is delicious but the pasta wasn‚Äôt cooked, my friends and I gave feedback about the pasta and the guys with curly hair was soooo rude, Had big attitude couldn‚Äôt take any responsibility.. I feel so sad bc we loved the food however we aren‚Äôt going back even again, also my friends was gave them 5 stars before and they were
here several times

I sincerely enjoy dining here. Always a good spot! Food is consistent, delicious, and service is always expedited. Food is always on point and I‚Äôve tried different items on their menu. My drink to go is the Blood Orange Negroni. My favorite appetizer is the eggplant involtini and I highly suggest trying the gnocchi or pasta a la Norma. üòã  by the way this place is always busy and they do not take reservations. However, shoutout to the kind host (redhead) who always has a spot for me ü•πü´∂

The food and appetizers are exceptional! Recommended the octopus, it‚Äôs very refreshing as a starter. I also had a lamb pasta, the red sauce added so much flavor and the el Dante is right on spot. I would come for food again but really it is way too loud for dinners‚Ä¶ and maybe not good if you want to have conversations

Kleines, aber sehr authentisches und gem√ºtliches italienisches Restaurant mit hervorragender Pizza. Sehr nettes Personal! Leider ziemlich laut, sonst w√§ren wir gerne noch l√§nger gem√ºtlich sitzen geblieben. Es lohnt sich, zu reservieren!

David was our waiter. He was an authentic, Sicilian waiter attentive to our needs and provided a high quality experience. The only disappointing thing was getting a chocolate torte rather than the Tiramisu. Regardless, everything was absolutely delicious!

Went for lunch, we shared the Margherita Pizza and the Trapanese Pesto Pasta, both great. The pizza is delicious, thin crust with oven burnt borders, perfect. The pesto is delicious, big plate (and full ofgarlic, so make sure you like it if ordering)

Absolutely delicious food! The Busiate al pesto trapanese pasta was so flavorful and rich, definitely one of the best pasta dishes I've ever had. The pizza was also very good with an extremely good/flavorful crust!

Ulysses provided professional hospitality service. The environment is welcoming and comfortable. The wine pours are generous. The Sicilian food is absolutely the best Italian I have had in New York City, and I am Italian! The pasta was done to perfection! They have fabulous bread. Norma‚Äòs handles special diet Requests with expertise and do not skimp on presentation & flavor delight!

Great little spot. Feels very authentic and it attracted lots of Italian people.

The front of house hostess didnt make us wait long and the wait staff were very quick and attentive.

Food was very delicious. The artichoke wasnt my favorite, seemed like it was missing something but the pizza was amazing. The cous cous dish was phenomenal!

Drinks were very good.

Great place for a date or a night to talk with friends.

‚Ä¢ This Italian restaurant exudes an authentic Italian ambiance, providing a truly immersive dining experience.
‚Ä¢ The staff is incredibly friendly and engaging, adding to the warm and welcoming atmosphere.
‚Ä¢ The food is absolutely delicious, with standout dishes like the mouthwatering cannoli, which is undoubtedly one of the best in town.
‚Ä¢ The pasta dishes are prepared to perfection, showcasing the restaurant's commitment to quality and attention to detail.
‚Ä¢ The interior design is simple yet inviting, creating a cozy and comfortable setting for enjoying a meal.
‚Ä¢ While the restaurant wasn't overly crowded during the lunchtime visit, the music volume near the corner table with the speaker was a bit too loud.

Overall, despite the minor issue with the music volume, the experience at this Italian restaurant was thoroughly enjoyable, making it a highly recommended destination for authentic Italian cuisine.

LOVE this place!!! . Very cute, casual yet authentic Italian food in Hell‚Äôs Kitchen. Loved their airy pizza, pasta, and white wineüëå Definitely will be back to try more dishes!

***updates***
So I've been back for many times since my first visit and love it every time!! Always packed, no reservations, only walk-ins but rarely have to wait unless it's a busy time!

In a city with a lot of food options, Norma is great go-to Italian spot. It had a nice atmosphere and the prices were very affordable for NYC standards.

We started with the arancini and potato cake. Both were very food; the aranicini was cooked perfectly and the dipping sauce for the potatoes was excellent.

I tried two pasta dishes, and it the portion size was more than expected and the sauce complimented the pasta well. We got a pizza for the table that was loaded with fresh ingredients.

A great spot for Italian
Wow! What a great experience! Great, service, atmosphere and food; highly recommend trying the Busiate con Pesto di Pistacchi e Gamberi 11/10.
Friendly service, great value, excellent food. Space is a bit noisy and cramped, but very good vibes all around!
